Important.definition: Severely injured or disabled so normal movement is limited.
Easy to use or fitting well with someone's needs or plans.
Very small in amount, degree, or size.
To disturb, annoy, or give someone inconvenience; to take the trouble to do something.
To recognize or point out differences between things or people.
Extremely interesting and holding someone's attention.
Used to refer to one or the other of two people or things.
So strong or great it is difficult to handle or resist.
Continuing firmly despite difficulty or opposition.
Causing someone to feel frightened or less confident.
To provide space; to adapt or make suitable for someone's needs.
Careful to avoid potential danger or problems.
An agreement reached when each side makes concessions.
Freed from restraint, control, or traditional limits.
Unwillingness to accept beliefs or behaviors different from one's own; inability to tolerate substances.
Done intentionally and carefully; slow and considered in action or thought.
The state of being present or noticeable.
Existing to a high degree; very strong or extreme.
Causes admiration or respect; produces a strong effect on someone.
An improvement in mood or condition; to raise morally or spiritually.
Including a wide range of people or things; not excluding.
Arousing admiration because of size, quality, or skill.
To make something more difficult to understand or deal with.
Driving too closely behind another vehicle.
A person walking; also used to mean ordinary or unremarkable.
Not given proper care or attention.
Currently in existence; real.
Something that causes trouble, difficulty, or annoyance.
Something that makes a task easier or more comfortable.
To stop something from happening or someone from doing something.
Describing people who are advanced in age.
Extremely annoying; causing great anger.
Things regarded as more important and dealt with first.
The ability to understand and share another person's feelings.
The mental strength to control one's actions and achieve goals.
A short, loud sound made by a car horn or sometimes a goose.
Lack of success; the state of not achieving a goal.
Extremely large in size or scale.
Weakened or exposed to risk (for example, a security breach).
Open to harm, attack, or emotional hurt.
In a way that applies to everyone or everywhere.
The state of being not present or missing.
A rapid or serious increase in intensity or scope.
Closely connected or appropriate to the matter at hand.
The act of receiving; also a formal welcome or the response given to someone.
Behavior that conforms to accepted standards of morality and respect.
Made to feel ashamed or foolish.
To continue firmly despite difficulty or opposition.
To suddenly attack verbally or physically; to react angrily.
To praise or represent as greater or better than is deserved.
Planned or meant for a particular purpose.
Become aware of or interpret something in a particular way.
Gives special importance or attention to something.
Extremely unpleasant or shocking.
Attracting attention because of unusual or notable qualities.
Acts against or opposes something.
Firmly established or originating from something.
Unspoken rules or standards of behavior in a group.
A way of dealing with something; to come near.
To think about carefully.
People who are very interested in a subject or activity.
Filled with a disorganized collection of things; messy.
A meeting to seek advice or discuss matters, often professional.
Now and then; not frequently.
Short for synchronize — to make things operate at the same time or rate.
To recognize the value of something or feel thankful for it.
Complete disorder and confusion.
Causing one to feel ashamed or awkward.
A feeling of self-consciousness, shame, or awkwardness.
Interrupting or disturbing the normal course of something.
To make great effort to achieve something.
The quality of speech that expresses mood or personality.
Very serious or harsh in degree or effect.
An expression meaning complete agreement with a statement.
Allowing oneself something enjoyable, often more than is necessary.
Breaking into small pieces or deteriorating.
To act as if something is true when it is not.
Moving or happening very quickly with urgency.
Far away in space, time, or emotionally aloof.
An idea or concern that constantly occupies someone's mind.
In a way that cannot be denied; clearly true.
Made less wide; limited or restricted.
Ejecting saliva or other matter from the mouth.
Imagined as a future possibility.
Met or experienced, often unexpectedly.
Extremely interesting and engaging attention.
Past tense of exert — applied force, influence, or effort.
Past tense of grind; reduced to small particles or powder.
To crush or pulverize into small pieces or powder.
A remark intended to provoke, insult, or mock someone.
To cause a reaction, especially an angry or upset response.
An event or occurrence, often unusual or important.
Very unusual, remarkable, or exceptional.
To make it difficult for someone to do something.
To pause before acting due to uncertainty or reluctance.
The quality of being closely connected to the matter at hand.
Looking with partially closed eyes; can also refer to an eye condition.
Certain to happen; unavoidable.
Feeling ashamed or self-conscious.
For a very short time; in a moment.
To add more detail; involving many carefully arranged parts.
Extremely funny.
Possibly; with the capacity to develop into something.
The end or final judgment reached after consideration.
Aware and able to think or perceive.
Able to adapt or be used in many different ways.
To move around aimlessly or without a fixed destination.
Annoyed repeatedly with requests or interruptions.
To break the continuity of something; to cut in.
Funny or amusing.
Not connected to the matter being considered.
To perform or complete a task or plan.
Simple past tense of 'begin' — an action that started in the past.
Past participle of 'begin' — used with auxiliary verbs (has/have) to form perfect tenses.
To overpower or defeat completely; to give too much to handle.
Large in amount or importance.
In a genuine and honest way.
Only just; scarcely.
As far as one can tell from the available information.
An act of kindness or preferential treatment.
On the condition that; supplied or given.
Suddenly and unexpectedly; often in a curt manner.
A person you work with professionally.
Able to exist or work together without conflict.
Lower in quality, value, or status.
An expression of sympathy to someone grieving a loss.
A particular attitude or point of view about something.
A large or more-than-sufficient amount.
To succeed in dealing with a problem or defeat something.
To give special importance or attention to something.
Willing to give or share freely and abundantly.
Having an exaggerated sense of one's own importance or abilities.
The act of concentrating or noticing something.
Distance from top to bottom; intensity or complexity of feeling or thought.
With ease and flow, especially in speaking a language.
Frequently; many times.
A close and harmonious relationship founded on mutual understanding.
A state of hopelessness and loss of hope.
Acting without careful consideration; hasty and unwise.
Extremely good or wonderful; amazing.
To accept, admit, or recognize the existence or truth of something.
Having lost confidence or enthusiasm.
Covering or affecting a large area or range.
A state of excited uncertainty about what will happen next.

Other.definition: Tendency to be quiet and reserved; reluctant to share thoughts.
The process of putting a plan or system into operation.
A comparison used to explain or clarify similarities between things.
To rise or float, typically by means outside ordinary physical explanation.
The quality of being trusted and believed in.
A filming technique showing slow processes by capturing frames at intervals.
Intimidating; seeming difficult to deal with.
Holding beliefs that are contradicted by reality or rational argument.
Involving or causing a complete or dramatic change.
A large, often disorderly group or crowd.
The act of changing tone, pitch, or signal characteristics.
Sound signals that help perception and interpretation.
Informal slang for a nomination or name recognition in some contexts.
Believing in high or noble goals, sometimes unrealistically.
Main characters in a story around whom the plot revolves.
Distorted from the usual in shape or morally abnormal.
Marked or stained; also to attack someone's reputation unfairly.
The act of spreading a substance or damaging reputation.
Understanding something instinctively without conscious reasoning.
Immediate understanding or knowing without explicit reasoning.
Excessive self-interest and lack of empathy for others.
A compelling attractiveness or charm that inspires devotion in others.
Showing deep understanding and clear perception of a situation.
Deserving respect because of age, character, or position.
Techniques used to aid memory retention.
Humor that criticizes by using irony, exaggeration, or ridicule.
An explanation or way of understanding the meaning of something.
To explain or translate the meaning of something.
Arguments presented to oppose another argument.
To destroy completely; reduce to nothing.
A combination of statements that are logically inconsistent.
A system for detecting objects or a person's keen awareness.
Wider, more complex topics that encompass multiple related concerns.
A brave fighter or soldier.
Impossible to defeat or overcome.
To deliver a speech, often formally or at length.
A large ensemble of musicians playing together.
Having a strong desire for success or achievement.
Extremely thorough and careful.
Disappointment resulting from discovering something is less good than believed.

Important.definition: A business organization that produces goods or provides services.
Payment made to someone to cover expenses they incurred.
Adding variety to reduce risk (e.g., investments).
Producing a great deal of profit; financially rewarding.
Sufficient for a particular purpose; acceptable but not outstanding.
Using borrowed funds or resources to increase potential returns.
Facilities where grains or other materials are ground or processed.
In a way that causes major or sudden change.
Dependent on something or someone for support or function.
A group of people organized for a common purpose.
Growing, prospering, or doing well.

Other.definition: A risky business undertaking with potential for profit.
Exactness and accuracy in measurement or performance.
So small or unimportant as to be disregarded.
The act of imposing a tax, fee, or fine.
Someone who examines information to give insight or recommendations.
Relating to qualities or non-numerical characteristics of something.
Using multiple processors to perform tasks simultaneously.
A primary processing unit within a CPU that executes instructions.
To make the best or most effective use of something.
Groups of vehicles or ships traveling together for protection.
Amount of a substance within a given volume or area.
The carrying out or implementation of a plan or task.
The process of putting a plan or system into effect.
Selecting a smaller group of candidates from a larger pool.
To raise to a higher position or level.
A competitor striving for the same goal or advantage.

Important.definition: Held by authorities for questioning or legal reasons.
Ensuring compliance with laws, rules, or regulations.
Removed from a property by lawful authority.
To officially end or stop a practice or institution.
Someone who steals another person's property.
The act of taking someone else's property without permission.
Permission or agreement for something to happen.
Failure to exercise reasonable care, causing harm or loss.
Improperly disposing of waste in public spaces.
The state of being worthy of respect.
To disagree with and try to prevent something.
A statement or situation indicating possible harm or danger.
Forbidden by law or authority.
To admit to doing something wrong, often a crime.
Determined or having found a solution to a problem.
Making information known, especially previously private or secret facts.
Persuaded or enrolled someone to join an organization.

Other.definition: To encourage or stir up violent or unlawful actions.
Proved to be false or incorrect.
To remove criminal penalties for a specific act.
Crossing a street carelessly or unlawfully.
An attempt to hide wrongdoing or mistakes.
Applying to a period in the past.
Selected and listed for jury service.
An officer acting as a deputy or second-in-command.
Made up or not real.
Ability to make independent decisions.
The act of returning an injury or attack.
To make an attack in return for another attack.
To formally give up a claim, right, or title.
Encouraging others to act, often in a harmful way.
Expressing disagreement, especially officially or publicly.
The act of stopping something from being seen or operating.
Organized resistance against authority or government.
Setting or fixing boundaries.
To authorize the use of medicine or set a rule officially.
Lack of ability to perform a task successfully.
Said to be the case but not yet proven.
Having sensitive information removed or obscured from a document.
Freedom to decide or act according to one's judgment.
Loyalty or commitment to a group or cause.
Operating secretly within a community, often for investigation.
Extremely cruel acts, often involving physical violence.
Something that exists as a separate and distinct unit.

Important.definition: To suffer or die from lack of food.
The main structural parts of a plant supporting leaves and flowers.
To fall down or give way suddenly.
Extremely tired or depleted of resources.
To pursue someone or something with the aim of catching.
An unpleasant emotion caused by perceived danger or threat.
A structure where bees live and produce honey.
To look fixedly at something for a prolonged time.
To move slowly on hands and knees or close to the ground.
To burst forth violently, as a volcano does with lava and ash.

Other.definition: Marine invertebrates and the hard structures they build (reefs).
A perennial flowering plant in the Apocynaceae family.
Symbols, often animals or plants, representing a group or clan.
Main stems of plants or supporting structures of leaves and flowers.
Very violent, intense, or powerful.
A covering spread over soil to retain moisture and improve fertility.
Growing crops in stacked layers, often without soil.
An overhead layer, such as tree leaves or a sheltering cover.
The act of entering into or passing through something.
A stretch of land considered with regard to its features.
How common something is within a particular population.
The study of the structure of living organisms.
Relating to spring.
To make pain or a problem less severe.
Affecting an entire system or body rather than a part.
Food or other necessities that sustain life.
Causes to die or be unable to breathe.
The process of young animals emerging from eggs.
To provide food or substances needed for growth or health.
A state where the senses are excessively activated.
From time to time; at regular or irregular intervals.
A violent release of energy, often causing a rapid expansion.
An innate, automatic reaction or behavior.
To block breathing or obstruct an airway.
Light in color or lacking strong pigmentation.
Mental processes involved in knowledge and understanding.
Extremely bad or shockingly cruel.
Restricts or slows down a process.
Moves without a fixed path or purpose.

Important.definition: To reach a condition suitable for eating or harvesting.
Fully developed and ready to eat.
A green leafy vegetable (Palak) used in cooking.
Releases of gas from the stomach through the mouth (belching).

Other.definition: A crunchy, mild-flavored vegetable similar to a turnip.
A collection of gift items, often food, packaged together.

Important.definition: A smooth transition between colors used in design.
Very tall buildings designed for human occupation.
A secondary ceiling installed below the main structural ceiling.
An area where visitors are welcomed or a social event to receive guests.
A narrow division of a road marked for traffic or a small street.

Other.definition: A gradient that blends more than two colors smoothly.
A gradual blending of one color hue into another.
A small sealed glass container used to store liquids or samples.
Large outdoor advertising boards, also called billboards.
A room for receiving and seating guests (living/dining area).
A decorative strip used in architecture and interior finishing.
A recurring decorative element or theme.
Serving as decoration rather than having a practical purpose.
A chemical used to make durable plastic resins and surfaces.
A large painting applied directly to a wall or ceiling.
Stone or decorative caps placed on top of piers or pillars.
A rotating warning light often used with alarms.
A loud warning device used on emergency vehicles.
The art of creating three-dimensional forms by carving or casting.
A monumental arch built to commemorate victories or events.
A secondary road providing access to buildings or properties.
A strange or complicated-looking mechanical device.
Not able to bend or be easily changed in shape.

preposition.definition: On the subject of; concerning.
At a higher position than; over.
From one side to the other side of something.
Later in time than; following.
In opposition to; touching or supported by.
Moving or placed beside the length of something.
In the middle of or shared by more than two.
On every side of; surrounding; approximately (with numbers).
Used to indicate role, function, or comparison.
Indicating a specific place, time, or position.
Earlier than in time or position ahead of.
At the back of; later than or not keeping up with.
At a lower level or position than something else.
Directly under something; lower than.
At the side of; next to.
At, into, or across the space separating two things or people.
Further on than; outside the limit of.
Indicating the agent in passive constructions; near or next to.
Without being affected by; in spite of.
From a higher to a lower position; along a slope.
Throughout the course or duration of (a period of time).
Not including; other than.
With the purpose of; intended to benefit; during a period of time.
Indicating the starting point in time, place, or source.
Within the interior of something.
To the inside of; indicating movement toward the interior.
Similar to; in the manner of.
Close to in distance, time, or relationship.
Expressing relationship, origin, or possession.
Away from a place or position; not operating.
Resting on the surface of; referring to time or topic.
To a position on the surface of something (movement).
Facing or across from; completely different from.
Away from the inside to the outside.
On or to the exterior of something.
Above or higher than; across from one side to another.
Beyond in space or time; earlier than.
Around or surrounding (British/informal variant of 'around').
From a past time until now.
Used for comparisons (e.g., taller than).
From one side to the other; by means of.
Expressing motion toward a point, direction, or recipient.
In the direction of; with regard to.
Below or beneath something.
Directly below or hidden by something above.
Different from; not typical of.
Up to the point in time or event specified.
From a lower to a higher position; along an incline.
Formal equivalent of 'on' used especially in literary contexts.
By way of; through the route or medium of.
Accompanied by; having; using.
Inside the limits of something (time, space, or scope).
In the absence of; not having.
In the middle of; surrounded by.

Differences.explanation: Inclusive means including all items/people; exclusive restricts access to a limited group.
A roof protects a building from weather; a terrace is an outdoor area for leisure.
Both introduce alternatives; 'instead' often replaces an action, 'rather than' contrasts choices.
Lemons are usually larger and yellow with a floral sour taste; limes are smaller, green, and more sharply acidic.
A coach is a rail car; a compartment is a subdivided space within certain coaches.
Condolence expresses sympathy; a tribute honors or shows respect to someone.
Instinct is an automatic biological response; intuition is an immediate understanding without explicit reasoning.
Began is the simple past of 'begin'; begun is the past participle used with auxiliary verbs.
Implementation is setting up or preparing; execution is performing or carrying out the plan.
'Although' links contrasting ideas within a sentence; 'however' usually starts a new sentence to contrast.
All express reasons; 'because' is direct, 'as' and 'since' are often more formal or explanatory.
